title: Trade Deadline Expectations
description:
Brian Windhorst is joined by ESPN’s Tim MacMahon and Tim Bontemps to talk how the Grizzlies have become the most fun team in the NBA, what trades the Pelicans can make, if CJ McCollum will be traded and why this may be a tame trade deadline.
Learn more about your ad choices. Visit megaphone.fm/adchoices

itunes:subtitle: Hoop Collective: Memphis Most Exciting IN NBA, Potential Trades
